title: Ticket #6575: Improve error handling when proxy delegation fails
description:
Our error handling when a proxy delegation over a CEDAR connect fails should be improved.

  • Extract and log relevant error messages from the Globus libraries. [Done]
  • Keep the two sides in sync, so that further communication is possible. [Done]
  • In file transfer, recognize failures that should put the job on hold (e.g. source file can't be read). [Not done]
